meanings.definition: A sandwich made with thinly sliced beefsteak and melted cheese, typically served on a hoagie roll.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a delicious cheesesteak for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The cheesesteak from that food truck is always amazing.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cheesesteak break up with the hamburger? It found a roll it could rely on.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as comforting as a warm cheesesteak on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling cheesesteak filled the entire kitchen.

meanings.definition: To prepare or eat a cheesesteak sandwich.
meanings.sent2: I love to cheesesteak with my friends on weekends.
meanings.sent3: He tried to cheesesteak quietly, but the sizzle gave him away.
meanings.sent4: She cheesesteaked her way through the entire menu at the new restaurant.
meanings.sent5: The family gathered around to cheesesteak together, creating lasting memories.
